dynamic_line: If you don't mind I'd rather have my kitchen be free of obstacles as I work.
Most don't realize the stresses that come with a culinary job.
Please don't mess with any of the food or preperation stations in here.
Every day slaving away over a hot stove or pot.
Why do I wear this hat? Keeps the hair out of the food and feels fitting for some reason.
There are so many recipes I want to try but work makes it almost impossible to experiment.
